Project.shortdesc: RIOJA will deliver a tool to support automated interactions between journals and public repositories. The RIOJA tool will be generic, and the project will deliver an implementation of the tool for the arXiv subject repository. A demonstrator journal, using Cornell University's open source DPubS software, interfacing with the RIOJA implementation for arXiv, will be constructed, populated with test papers in the field of Astrophysics and Cosmology.
Project.name: RIOJA: Repository Interface for Overlaid Journal Archives
